snippet.textDisplay:
You know what I miss, games like these.  No, I'm not talking about the other great games I over looked because of the games, I'm talking about companies that make these great games going bad and not producing games like these anymore.

I wish Square Enix and EA stops being a jackoff and starts creating decent games again.  Hell, I am going to have them going through discipline, force them to play Final Fantasy IX, Grandia, and Super Mario RPG.  Then I would evaluate how they are, then fire all the people who believe these games suck, and then those who agree that the game is good, I would retrain them about the aspects of them being a good game.  Maybe that would shake up the industry and we get more gems like these.  Oh, and yea.  Gems like these WITHOUT disposable microtransactions, on-disc DLC, and online passes.
snippet.textOriginal:
You know what I miss, games like these.  No, I'm not talking about the other great games I over looked because of the games, I'm talking about companies that make these great games going bad and not producing games like these anymore.

I wish Square Enix and EA stops being a jackoff and starts creating decent games again.  Hell, I am going to have them going through discipline, force them to play Final Fantasy IX, Grandia, and Super Mario RPG.  Then I would evaluate how they are, then fire all the people who believe these games suck, and then those who agree that the game is good, I would retrain them about the aspects of them being a good game.  Maybe that would shake up the industry and we get more gems like these.  Oh, and yea.  Gems like these WITHOUT disposable microtransactions, on-disc DLC, and online passes.

snippet.textDisplay: @Azuresan Action RPG's aren't a good subsitution for a good old fashioned RPG as for Dragon Quest IX I missed that one.Probably because SE pushed FF more than any other game.They're still trying to release other FF games.Squaresoft back then was more diverse than SE.In closing I played 2 Kingdom Hearts games and they were good but Grandia3...I personally loved that game more than the KH games.However I also loved DQ8.which was my 1st DQ game.I always did want another one.

Great collection.

Great collection.

snippet.textDisplay:
3 was aight, imo.

Mad fun to play, all Grandia's are. Graphics were good too. Im not a graphics person at all (Doesnt make a game good, makes a good game better). 

But what really drove me up the wall was the textbook story. Ironically, im not much of a story person, but it was sooo predictable it was painful. :|
snippet.textOriginal:
